metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Technology partners work with Cloudflare to deliver solutions that use Cloudflare's network and infrastructure.

relatedBlades.title: Technology Partner Program
relatedBlades.subtitle: Create value for mutual customers through partner integrations with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's Technology Partnerships Program facilitates and drives innovative integrations that create value for joint customers and our technology partners. Our partners not only benefit from technical integrations with us, but also have the opportunity to drive sales and marketing efforts targeted towards mutual customers and prospects. All partnership categories align with our broad solution areas: application services, Zero Trust services, network services, and developer services.

featureLists.title: Application Services
featureLists.description: Secure and accelerate your apps, APIs, and websites in minutes by pointing your DNS to Cloudflare. Instantly turn on performance and security services.

featureLists.title: Zero Trust Services
featureLists.description: Increase visibility, eliminate complexity, and reduce risks for remote and office users alike. Stop data loss, malware and phishing, and secure users, applications, and devices.

featureLists.title: Network Services
featureLists.description: Networking services to help enterprises connect, secure, and accelerate their corporate networks â€” without the cost and complexity of managing legacy network hardware.

featureLists.title: Developer Services
featureLists.description: Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.

resourceList.title: Technology Partners: Blog
resourceList.description: Learn how Cloudflare's Technology Partner Program facilitates innovative integrations that create value for our customers, our technology partners, and Cloudflare.
